name: CLACKAMAS COUNTY, OR
sampleDescriptions: Monitor legislation relating to housing funding.
Monitor notices of funding availability; legislation related to economic development.
Monitor implementation of P.L. 114-322, the WINN Act, seek release by USACOE of guidance interpreting Disposition Study amendment included in WIIN Act.
Monitor legislation relating to Waters of the US Rule.
